data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The export of transport services is an important component of Russia's GDP. The ____ anticipates ____ between 2007 and 2030, ____ measures ____ in ____ 2008 ____ strategy ____ increase ____ export ____ transport ____ to a total ____ of $80 ____, a sevenfold ____ on ____ 2008 ____. Foreign cargo weight transported is expected to increase from 28 million tonnes to 100 million tonnes over the same period.
data.partBlankContent: The export of transport services is an important component of Russia's GDP. The gover_____ anticipates th__ between 2007 and 2030, t__ measures incl____ in i__ 2008 tran_____ strategy wi__ increase t__ export o_ transport serv____ to a total va___ of $80 bil____, a sevenfold incr____ on i__ 2008 va___. Foreign cargo weight transported is expected to increase from 28 million tonnes to 100 million tonnes over the same period.
data.answer: 运输服务出口是俄罗斯GDP的重要组成部分。政府预计，在2007年至2030年期间，其2008年运输战略中包括的措施将使运输服务出口总额增至800亿美元，较2008年增长7倍。同期，国外货物运输重量预计将从2800万吨增加到1亿吨。
